org.forgerock.openidm.servlet.internal

Class IDMSecurityContextFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.servlet.internal.IDMSecurityContextFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.json.resource.servlet.HttpServletContextFactory

    public class IDMSecurityContextFactory
extends Object
implements org.forgerock.json.resource.servlet.HttpServletContextFactory
    An HttpServletContextFactory responsible for creating a SecurityContext for OpenIDM requests. Specifically, this class executes each of the augmentation scripts that were registered with the ServletComponent.

      Construct the IDMServletContextFactory.
